statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customer_data ORDER BY address DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE preferences->'language' = 'English';
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT customer_name, preferences->'favorite_color' AS favorite_color FROM customer_data WHERE preferences @> '{"favorite_food": "pizza"}';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT c.customer_name, p.preferred_pickup_day FROM customers c INNER JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences JOIN customers ON preferences.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT service_type, service_cost FROM pick_up_services WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE pickup_schedule BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '16:00:00';
SELECT service_id, service_type, service_cost FROM pick_up_services WHERE active = TRUE ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM waste_categories ORDER BY category_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, r.request_date, c.category_name FROM customers c JOIN pick_up_requests r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN waste_categories c ON r.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT p.preference_type, c.category_description FROM preferences p JOIN waste_categories c ON p.preference_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT address_id, street_address, city, state FROM Address WHERE state='CA';
SELECT preference_id, service_type, frequency, reminders FROM Preferences ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT center_name, capacity, availability FROM RecyclingCenter WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY last_name DESC;

SELECT Customer.first_name, Preferences.service_type, PickUpSchedule.date FROM Customer JOIN Preferences ON Customer.customer_id = Preferences.customer_id JOIN PickUpSchedule ON Customer.customer_id = PickUpSchedule.customer_id WHERE PickUpSchedule.date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT Address.street_address, Address.city, Address.state, RecyclingCenter.center_name FROM Address JOIN RecyclingCenter ON Address.address_id = RecyclingCenter.address_id WHERE RecyclingCenter.availability = true;

SELECT Customer.first_name, Customer.last_name, Address.city, RecyclingCenter.capacity FROM Customer JOIN Address ON Customer.customer_id = Address.customer_id JOIN RecyclingCenter ON Address.address_id = RecyclingCenter.address_id WHERE RecyclingCenter.capacity >= 100;
